name: Math World VR
abstract: Math World VR combines fun mini games with simple math to help sharpen your mind. This is also known as “Mental Math” which is the process of doing math in our head, without the need for a calculator.

detail.app_release_note:
Patch v3.0 Notes:

1. Developed a new main menu interface, allowing players to scroll and click through all of the different mini-games using the slider system or buttons.
2. Improved the High Score system, allowing up to 5 players to save their high score on each mini-game.
3. An additional 4 mini-games have been added:
a. Frisbee
b. Mini-Golf
c. Multiples Paintball
d. Slingshot
4. More prizes/skins have been added to the new mini-games and a few of the existing mini-games.
5. The environment for each mini-game has been improved for performance and aesthetics.
6. Fixed very minor bugs to improve player experiences.
7. Now supports Japanese & Spanish languages.
